title: BallPark Franks Logotype
content:
This is probably custom... but does anyone know the face its based on?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010183326im_/http:/typophile.com/files/BallPark_5472.jpg)
author: vwcruisn

comments.content: Custom lettering is not always based on an existing font. You might dig [FF Tartine Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010183326/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=12&displayfontid=FF.11326.0.0&fontRendererText=Ball+Park).

Letterhead Fonts also has ['Ballpark Script'](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010183326/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/contributors/tomkennedy/ballpark.shtml), which even comes with a set of swooping swashes for the underlining part, but be aware, you need graphic software to attach them to the words. They also have a more antique style, called 'Ephemera', also with the swashes.

- Mike Yanega
